Open source game creation software: No p: Open source game creation software: No programming or coding is required! Make HTML5 and natives games for Windows, Linux (Ubuntu) and Mac OS X. Quickly build and share your games on mobile (Android and iOS) and on the web.
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Create games without programming - Open source HTML5 and native game creator
GDevelop is an <span class=\"foss\">open: GDevelop is an open source, cross-platform game creator designed to be used by everyone - no programming skills required.
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: What makes GDevelop unique and so easy to use are the events. Events are a powerful way to express the logic of your game, without having to learn a programming language.
Events are composed of conditions, on th: Events are composed of conditions, on the left, and actions that are run when conditions are fulfilled
When Space is pressed, the character ani: When Space is pressed, the character animation and a sound are played. If a bomb touches the character, they are both destroyed.
GDevelop's flexible architecture allows: GDevelop's flexible architecture allows you to choose if you want to create an HTML5 game that can be played on the web and exported to Android, or a native game for your operating system. You can also activate both platforms and export your game everywhere!
Create games for Android and iOS without: Create games for Android and iOS without programming
GDevelop's features are provided thanks: GDevelop's features are provided thanks to extensions, allowing you to embed just what you need into your game. Here is a short list of what you get when using GD!
Tons of objects ready to be used: Tons of objects ready to be used
Draw your own shape on screen with the S: Draw your own shape on screen with the Shape Painter
Make RPG-like maps with the Tiled map ob: Make RPG-like maps with the Tiled map objects
Quickly add behaviors to your objects: Quickly add behaviors to your objects
- Add realistic behavior to your objects: - Add realistic behavior to your objects
Allow your objects to avoid obstacles wh: Allow your objects to avoid obstacles while moving
- create platformer games in a breeze: - create platformer games in a breeze
- quickly make your objects draggable wi: - quickly make your objects draggable with mouse/touch
And more, to automate current tasks and: And more, to automate current tasks and behaviors in a few clicks!
The scene editor lets you visually edit: The scene editor lets you visually edit your levels
- Add interfaces and create parallax eff: - Add interfaces and create parallax effects
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Create your levels dynamically with external layouts
Save player data with HTML5 & native sto: Save player data with HTML5 & native storage
Full support for sound effects and music: Full support for sound effects and music
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Build ambitious games with advanced features
Communicate with external websites using: Communicate with external websites using HTTP requests
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures
